entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sundre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:16 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sundre Airport 01:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Wet flurries changing to flurries at times heavy this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
